cleaned_text: General and Allopathic Medicine Allopathic Medicine is fundamentally based on treating act by the mechanism of "opposites". That is: if there is flu, an anti-flu is given; if there is fever, an antipyretic is prescribed; if there is inflammation, he is medicated with an anti-inflammatory. Official medicine bases its treatment mainly on the ailment that afflicts the patient.
